title: I’m Worried My Husband’s Immaturity Is Going To Get Him Fired
description:
Listen as we talk with a woman who can’t trust her husband with their newborn, a wife who’s husband’s immaturity is going to get him fired, and a brave ex-Mormon struggling to leave the community they’ve always known.
  My husband and I aren’t on the same page with parenting & it’s affecting our marriage
 I'm worried my husband's immaturity is going to get him fired
 I want to leave my faith but I know I’ll be ostracized
 Lyrics of the Day: "(Sittin' On) The Dock Of The Bay" - Otis Redding
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
  Support Our Sponsors:
  BetterHelp
